TopicTitle: I guess he ain't coming back... - a comical KSP short

Articles.Content:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P3u971JrTCw



So I decided to check on how my Mun lander was doing, and it responded by committing suicide. Mr Kerman will not be returning from the Mun in the near future.

Yep, those medium lander legs love to troll.

Nicely done on the video

Yep, those medium lander legs love to troll.

Yeah, if you look closely you'll see I already lost my LV-909 engine because of the landing legs' lack of shock absorbtion.
